title: Red, White, & Bayou
description: Wyatt Landry is back in town...for one night only. At least, that's the plan. In spite of the big Fourth of July party, and his cousinâ€™s plan to set him up with a friend of hers, and how much he wishes things could be the way they used to be.But they're not. And he's hitting the road as soon as the sun sets.Until he sees her. The woman in the red dress. With the curves that make him think that he could stick around just a little longer...Then she turns around, and ğ˜©ğ˜°ğ˜­ğ˜º ğ˜©ğ˜¦ğ˜­ğ˜­.Trudy Sinclair is back in town too. And sheâ€™s all grown up.Now he's face to face with the girl who was the reason for more than one of his broken bones, a few stitches, and his juvenile arrest record.And the kiss he can't get out of his mind, even ten years later...
author: Erin Nicholas
